title: PRESS RELEASE:  Rhode Island Resident, Paul J. Monteiro, Indicted for Allegedly Sex Trafficking 14-Year-Old Girl
content: U.S. Attorney’s Office June 03, 2015 District of Rhode Island (401) 709-5000 Rhode Island Resident Indicted for Allegedly Sex Trafficking 14-Year-Old Girl PROVIDENCE, RI—A federal grand jury in Providence today returned a three-count indictment charging Paul J. Monteiro, a/k/a “Peezy,” 29, of Providence, with allegedly transporting a 14-year-old Rhode Island girl to New Jersey for […]
